DisplayForm.Script:
<UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title>title</Title> <AutoTransition>10</AutoTransition> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./9.xml"> <Label imgsrc="submit.jpg">Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="SkipGo" action="./10.xml"> <Label imgsrc="skipgo.jpg">Skipgo</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="./7.xml"> <Label imgsrc="back.jpg">Back</Label> </Op>
</Operations> <LinkScreen> <Description>Description (Cyprus 高知県 Bangladesh 静岡県 Bahrain )</Description>

</LinkScreen> </UiScreen>
